text: Huang Xiaolian (born 20 September 1990) is a Chinese wheelchair basketball player. She is a member of the China women's national wheelchair basketball team and the Guangdong Province team. She won the silver medal at the 2020 Summer Paralympics and the gold medal at the 2018 Asian Para Games. At the 2018 Women's World Wheelchair Basketball Championship she finished fourth. == References == == Other websites == * Huang Xiaolian L of China breaks through during the women's...
